excerpt: "In a virtual panel discussion about public and population health at J.P. Morgan's annual conference, the CEO of Aledade shared how the quest for efficiency in a world of harried physicians' practices almost led Aledade to use a flawed ML algorithm to engage at-risk patients of those practices."
